1.Title: Audi A6 50 TDI quattro: nemir v premijskem razredu
1.Subtitle: Test nove generacije
1.Lead: To je novi audi A6. V razred najdraĹľjih in najbolj premijskih Ĺľrebcev je vnesel nemir, Ĺˇe preden je sploh zapeljal na parkirni prostor, rezerviran za izvrĹˇnega direktorja.
1.Author: Miha Merljak
1.Content:
class="Body">
Samo poglejte njegovo masko â€“ to ogromno satovje z radarji na takem poloĹľaju, da se ti na avtocesti tudi pri 120 km/h vsi spoĹˇtljivo umikajo, saj so prepriÄŤani, da gre za Pahorjev ali Ĺ arÄŤev avto. Seveda, novi A6 lahko cesto in promet skenira s kar petimi radarji, petimi kamerami, infrardeÄŤo kamero za noÄŤni vid, dvanajstimi ultrazvoÄŤnimi senzorji in laserskim ÄŤitalnikom â€“ lidarjem. V glavnem vojaĹˇka tehnologija v sluĹľbi varnosti za fante, ki smo radi gledali Top Gun, Bonda in druge moĹľakarja s finimi igraÄŤami.
Novo poglavje
VozniĹˇki delovni prostor je novo poglavje digitalne dobe, z dvema ogromnima zaslonoma, ki tako kot naprednejĹˇi telefoni dregnejo blazinice vaĹˇih prstov, kot se sprehajate po steklu. A Ĺˇe bolj se nam zdi pomembno, da so osnovna stikala tam, kjer jih priÄŤakujete. Najprej so torej zagotovili enostavno osnovo, tisti bolj "advanced" vozniki pa si lahko nato vse skupaj Ĺˇe veliko bolj prilagodijo. Velik korak naprej pri kabinskem udobju zaznavajo tudi na zadnji klopi, tam je prostora v vseh smereh precej veÄŤ.
ÄŚe vam pogled na Audijev spisek dodatne opreme ne odvzame volje do Ĺľivljenja, potem vsekakor toplo priporoÄŤamo nakup zraÄŤnega vzmetenja, saj dobi z njim A6 veÄŤ razliÄŤnih in vozniĹˇko zelo uporabnih karakterjev.
Enako velja za seksi luÄŤi z inteligentno matriÄŤno osvetlitvijo, pa za Ĺˇportno podvozje in vsekakor za Ĺˇtirikolesno krmiljenje. S tem postane A6 med ovinki v obÄŤutku na volanu Ĺˇe veliko krajĹˇi in bolj agilen. Vse naĹˇteto smo preskuĹˇali v druĹľbi agregata 50 TDI, ki je v resnici klasiÄŤni trilitrski dizel, podkrepljen z elektromotorjem. Ja, ta audi je mehki hibrid z izjemnim navorom in dovolj moÄŤi kadar koli in kjer koli. Si pa mislimo, da bo najveÄŤji del trga zadovoljil Ĺľe uÄŤinkovit dvolitrski mehki hibrid z moÄŤjo 150 kilovatov.
KljuÄŤni tehniÄŤni podatki:
- na testu Audi A6 50 TDI quattro tiptronic

2

1.Title: Volvo XC 40 D4 AWD momentum: suvereno med najboljĹˇe v razredu
1.Subtitle: Test novega modela
1.Lead: XC 40 je najmanjĹˇi Volvov SUV, ki se oblikovno skoraj v celotni naslanja na oba veÄŤja predhodnika. Ĺ˝e samo s tem so mu vrata do denarnic tistih kupcev, ki iĹˇÄŤejo izstopajoÄŤo, a hkrati visoko kultivirano in preÄŤiĹˇÄŤeno dizajnersko govorico, na pol odprta.
1.Author: Miha Merljak
1.Content:
>Volvo se je niĹľjih srednjih razredov v preteklosti izogibal ali pa je vanje vstopal z zelo niĹˇnimi produkti, ki niso pustili veÄŤjega trĹľnega peÄŤata. V primeru XC 40 ni teĹľko napovedati, da bo ta tradicija prekinjena. Ponuja namreÄŤ visoko kakovost konÄŤne izdelave in v kabini odliÄŤno premiĹˇljeno funkcionalnost ter na dotik prijetne materiale.
Ĺ e posebej hvalimo Ĺˇtevilo, iznajdljivost in velikost razliÄŤnih odlagalnih prostorov ter Ĺˇiroke, ÄŤvrste in zelo udobne sedeĹľe. Intuitivno in enostavno logiÄŤno je upravljanje z velikim vmesnikom, ki z veÄŤfunkcijskim zaslonom na dotik kraljuje na z roko lahko dostopnem mestu na sredinski armaturi. RazoÄŤaranj ne bo niti v velikosti in uporabnosti prtljaĹľnega prostora, ki s 460 litri prostornine sicer ni med veÄŤjimi v razredu, a se v uporabniĹˇkem smislu odkupi z dobro urejenostjo ter domiselnimi reĹˇitvami pregrajevanja.
Foto: David Ĺ avli
XC 40 je od tal odmaknjen konkretnih 21 cm, a sta vzmetenje in krmilni mehanizem tako nastavljena, da ponuja tudi v hitro odpeljanih ovinkih zelo dolgo nevtralno in predvidljivo lego. V premeru preskuĹˇanega modela, ki je imel v paketu R design vzmetenje Ĺˇe nekoliko bolj trdo, se je to samo Ĺˇe bolj potrdilo, a je v tem primeru treba raÄŤunati na manj udobno voĹľnjo ÄŤez razliÄŤne asfaltne grbine. Podoben razmislek velja opraviti tudi pri izbiri motorja.
PreskuĹˇani 2-litrski dizel s 190 KM predstavlja vrh ponudbe, ki z moÄŤjo, udobjem in tudi povpreÄŤno porabo navduĹˇi predvsem pri avtocestnih dolgoprogaĹˇkih izzivih, v poÄŤasni mestni voĹľnji ter pri pogostih postankih in speljevanjih pa deluje preveÄŤ robusten.
XC 40 je s ÄŤvrsto gradnjo, funkcionalno in udobno kabino ter Ĺˇtevilnimi asistenÄŤnimi sistemi in izstopajoÄŤim skandinavskim dizajnom v premiĹˇljenem trenutku vstopil na trg modnih mestnih terencev, v katerem se brez ene same sence dvoma suvereno postavi med najdraĹľje in najbolj premijske v mestu.
KljuÄŤni tehniÄŤni podatki:
- na testu Volvo XC40 2.0 TD avt awd momentum
Mere:
- dolĹľina: 4,4 m
- medosna razdalja: 2,7 m
- obraÄŤalni krog: 11,4 m
- oddaljenost od tal: 21 cm
- prtljaĹľnik: 432 l
- masa: 2.250 kg
Pogon:
- 2-litrski 4-valjni bencinski motor
- moÄŤ: 140 kW
- navor: 400 Nm
- 8-stopenjski samodejni menjalnik
- pogon na vsa Ĺˇtiri kolesa

1.Title: 10-kt. Seven Diamond Ladies Heart Ring (0.08 TW)
1.Content:
This ladies fashion ring dazzles
with hearts and diamonds. The gold band is crafted into delicate, open hearts.
Seven brilliant-cut diamonds add a bit of sparkle.

2.Title: 10-Kt. Diamond Ring (.25 TW)
2.Content: Nineteen round diamonds accent this 10-karat yellow gold ring with filigree accents.

3.Title: 10-kt. Pearl and Diamond Butterfly Earrings
3.Content:
Perfectly proportioned 5.5- to
6-mm cultured pearls on 10-karat yellow gold settings highlight these petite
earrings. A dainty rhodium-plated gold butterfly studded with a diamond (0.02
total carat weight, J-K color, I-2 clarity) rests atop each pearl.

4.Title: 14-kt. Diamond 'S' Tennis Bracelet (2.00 TW)
4.Content:
Invest in a swirl of light with
this diamond 'S' tennis bracelet. Crafted in 14-karat gold, the piece features
49 diamonds for two full carats. The 7.25-inch bracelet closes with a pressure
clasp.

5.Title: 10-kt. Diamond Band Fashion Ring (.11 TW)
5.Content:
Crafted in white and yellow gold,
this ring displays a band of seven round diamonds. Order your new gold and
diamond fashion ring today at our low, online price.

6.Title: 14-kt. White Gold, Pearl and Diamond Ring
6.Content:
Show your romantic side with this
14-karat diamond and pearl ring. Set in a domed band of 14-karat white gold,
the ring features a 7-mm cultured pearl. Curved rows of diamonds flank the
pearl.

7.Title: 14-kt. Gold Diamond Present Future Pendant (.25TW)
7.Content:
Designed with three large, sparkling
diamonds to represent past, present, and future, this stunning pendant is
set in gleaming 14-karat gold. It incorporates a total of nine diamonds (0.25
total carat weight, K color, I-2 to I-3 clarity).

8.Title: 14-kt. Diamond Solitaire Pendant (.33 TW)
8.Content:
In this simple, yet elegant pendant,
a round brilliant diamond (0.33 total carat weight, H-J color, I-1 to I-2
clarity) is prong-set in 14-karat white gold.

9.Title: 14-kt. Diamond Solitaire Earrings (0.33 TW)
9.Content:
Dazzle your way into her heart,
with these classic diamond solitaire earrings. Two brilliant-cut diamonds
(0.33 total carat weight, G-H color, I-1 to I-2 clarity) are set in four
prongs of 14-karat white gold.

10.Title: 14-kt. Diamond Cross Pendant (.06 TW)
10.Content:
Over a cleanly sculpted Roman
cross of 14-karat white gold drapes a slender banner containing three bright
prong-set round diamonds (0.06 total carat weight, H-I color, I clarity).

11.Title: 14-kt. Diamond Solitaire Stud Earrings (.50 TW)
11.Content:
Every jewelry collection needs
a classic pair of diamond solitaire earrings. Set in 14-karat gold, these
diamond stud earrings (0.50 total carat weight) have post backs with butterfly
clasps.

12.Title: 14-kt. Cultured Pearl Diamond Earrings
12.Content:
Create an elegant appearance with
these pearl and diamond stud earrings. Set in 14-karat yellow gold, each
earring features an 8 to 8.5-mm cultured white pearl. Prong-set round diamonds
accent the pearls. Posts with butterfly clasps secure the earrings.

13.Title: 14-kt. Diamond 7.5-8 mm Pearl Pendant
13.Content:
Add a classic to your jewelry
collection with this 14-karat gold, diamond, and pearl necklace. The 7.5-8
mm cultured white pearl creates the focal point of the pendant, while a diamond
(0.10 TW) adds sparkle.

14.Title: 14-kt. Diamond Solitaire Earrings (.50 TW)
14.Content:
This earring set has two brilliant-cut
diamonds (0.50 total carat weight, G-H color, I-1 to I-2 clarity) set in
four prongs of 14-karat white gold.

15.Title: 14-kt White Gold Diamond Band (0.50 TW)
15.Content:
Crafted of 14-karat white gold,
this stylish ring features a bright row of 20 channel-set, princess-cut baguette
diamonds. Treat her like royalty and save when you buy jewelry treasures
at Overstock.com.

1.Title: 14-kt. Green Jade Hoops
1.Content:
Hoops of cool green jade rest
between 14-karat yellow gold endpieces. The hoops graduate in thickness from
3 mm at the ends to 6 mm in the center, with approximately 29 mm overall
diameter.

2.Title: 14-kt. Jade Doughnut Pendant
2.Content:
The 25-mm disk hangs delicately
from a 14-karat gold chain. The disk features a dramatic gold Chinese character
in the center, accompanied by four stylized gold bees.

3.Title: 14-kt. Charcoal Jade and Ruby Elephant Pendant
3.Content:
Carved of rich dark grey jade,
this elephant pendant has 14-karat yellow gold applied to mark the feet,
tusk, tail, and blanket. A 2-mm round faceted ruby in a gold bezel setting
forms the eye. The pendant hangs from an 18-inch chain.

4.Title: 14-kt. Carved Lavender Jade Earrings
4.Content: Luscious 8-mm lavender jade balls, carved with intricate Asian style, dangle from a 14-karat yellow gold French hook.

5.Title: 14-kt. Jade Cross Pendant
5.Content:
Green jade and gold create this
beautiful cross pendant. Cylindrical bars of green jade feature caps and
center of 14-karat yellow gold.

6.Title: 14-kt. Multicolored Jade Earrings
6.Content:
A delicate wrapping of 14-karat
yellow gold wire holds six 6 x 4 pear shapes of jade in various shades: brilliant
green, orange, lavender, black, pale yellow, and white. The post earrings
have butterfly backs.

7.Title: 14-kt. Multicolored Jade Ring
7.Content:
A delicate wrapping of 14-karat
yellow gold wire holds six 6 x 4 ovals of jade in various shades: brilliant
green, orange, lavender, black, pale yellow, and white. A narrow gold band
divides to support the setting.

8.Title: 14-kt. Onyx and Ruby Elephant Pendant
8.Content:
Carved of rich black onyx, this
elephant pendant has 14-karat yellow gold applied to mark the feet, tusk,
tail, and blanket. A 2-mm round faceted ruby in a gold bezel setting forms
the eye. The pendant hangs from an 18-inch chain.
